definition: fork in road/bifurcation/branch in road, river, mountain range etc/to branch off/to turn off/to diverge/to stray (from the path)/to change the subject/to interrupt/to stagger (times)

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: I missed the turnoff and went 15 miles out of mey way.
sentences.chinese: 我迷失在岔道中，向前走了15英里就完全迷路了。

sentences.english: We can lose ourselves in all sorts of thorny byways .
sentences.chinese: 我们可能会在各种各样的荆棘岔道上迷失自己。

sentences.english: Take the left side road [fork] at the crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 到十字路口走左边的岔道。

sentences.english: Make a full stop at railroad crossings and stop signs. ;
sentences.chinese: 遇“铁路岔道口“与“暂停”的标志前要完全停止。

sentences.english: He skids along an avenue then turns down an alley.
sentences.chinese: 他的车在大街上滑了一段路，然后拐上了一条岔道。

sentences.english: There the road breaks [divides] into three.
sentences.chinese: 这条路在那儿分成三条岔道。

sentences.english: The turn off is about ten kilometres ahead. It's Exit 55.
sentences.chinese: 出口岔道在前边大约十公里处，是第55号出口。

sentences.english: The hat was in place and tied, but Tess had not stepped forward.
sentences.chinese: 是时间的反噬？还是命运的岔道？陈暮百思不得其解。

definition: winding road (twisting and turning like a sheep's intestine)
road as twisty as sheep's intestine (idiom); narrow and winding road/fig. complicated and tricky job
dead end/(fig.) the road to disaster
